post.text:
Trump's economic plan looks out for billionaires and millionaires like him while leaving working Americans out in the cold.

Watch live from Columbus, OH as Hillary talks about her plan to build a stronger economy for every family.

comment.author: Cameron
comment.text: Complete lies. Mr. Trump builds businesses and provides jobs. How many jobs has Hillary provided? How many businesses has Hillary built? Her money comes from contributions and speaking engagements. No jobs created there. I would love to hear her plan on how she intends to fight terrorism and build our economy. I think she will just bash her opponent and offer no real solutions.

replies.author: Cameron
replies.text: Sonja well that's not nice. Typical of someone that has nothing of substance to add to a debate to resort to childish behavior.

replies.author: Taylor
replies.text: You should do better homework Cameron !!!

replies.author: Cameron
replies.text: doing it. Maybe you can help me. How many jobs had she created? How many people does she employ? I see she has championed social programs. That does not create jobs to help people to provide for their families so they don't need those programs. I see the Clinton foundation sends money overseas to help people. What about taking care of your own first? Am I wrong about how the Clinton's have amassed their wealth? Help me out. Is it not through donations, speaking engagements and government jobs? I'll do some more research on that. When I cast my vote I want it to be for the best candidate. I am willing to keep an open mind and urge others to do the same.
